```{r,message=F,echo=F,warning=F}
# ---- Helper: read license from DESCRIPTION ----
get_license <- function(package, lib_path) {
  desc_file <- file.path(lib_path, package, "DESCRIPTION")
  if (file.exists(desc_file)) {
    lic <- tryCatch(
      read.dcf(desc_file)[1, "License"],
      error = function(e) NA
    )
  } else {
    lic <- NA
  }
  return(lic)
}

# ---- 3) Get package info from renv library ----
lib_path <- renv::paths$library()
pkg_list <- installed.packages(lib.loc = lib_path)
pkg_df <- as.data.frame(pkg_list, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

license_info <- pkg_df %>%
  rowwise() %>%
  mutate(License = get_license(Package, lib_path)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  select(package = Package, Version, License) %>%
  arrange(package)

# ---- 4) Output ----
kable(license_info, n = Inf) 
```
